to change how people get form place to place. In a speech Sept. 29 before the Techcrunch "Disrupt" conference, Google Inc. CEO Eric Schmidt said "your car should drive itself. It just makes sense." It's a bug that cars were invented before computers, Eric Schmidt said. The New York Times published a report on the development earlier Sunday.
